name: MIS Foreign National Population on ACCT Report
description:
Version: 00.00.01 Last Modified: 26/03/2019
This report returns national figures of Foreign National prisoners with open ACCT. The report will run for the day previous to the current date.
HQ0019

dataset.name: Population (3)
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.NET_POPULATION, AT_POPULATION_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.FACT_VIEW_POPULATION AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_POPULATION_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, (SELECT * FROM dual) DT_DUAL, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.DATE_SK = AT_POPULATION_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK <> 'ZZGHI' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND AT_POPULATION_DATE.DAY_DATE = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - 1), 'DD-MON-YYYY'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT NET_POPULATION, DAY_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_ALERT_STATUS = 1) AS V_COUNT_FN_ACCT, SUM((TO_DATE(ALERT_EFFECTIVE_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - TO_DATE(V_EXPIRY, 'DD/MM/YYYY'))) AS V_ACCT_DURATION, SUM(NaN) AS V_AVG_DAYS_OPEN FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: ACCT (2)
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END AS ALERT_EFFECTIVE_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END AS ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE, TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS TODAY_, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_STATUS FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ALERT AT_OFFENDER_ALERT, BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_ALERT.ALERT_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_DATE_SK = AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE_SK = AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DATE_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS') AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND AT_ALERT.ALERT_CODE_NK = 'HA' AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT <> 'TRN' AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK <> 'ZZGHI' AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION <> 'British') GROUP BY CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EFFECT_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE < '31/12/9000' THEN AT_ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE.DAY_DATE ELSE NULL END, TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_ALERT.ALERT_STATUS), dataset_ AS (SELECT COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, ALERT_EFFECTIVE_DATE, ALERT_EXPIRY_DATE, TODAY_, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_STATUS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: FN Pop
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COUNT(DISTINCT (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AS COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_POPULATION_DATE, (SELECT * FROM dual) DT_DUAL, BODIMIS.FACT_VIEW_POPULATION AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL WHERE (AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_FACT_VIEW_POPULATION.DATE_SK = AT_POPULATION_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION <> 'British' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK <> 'ZZGHI' AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND AT_POPULATION_DATE.DAY_DATE = TO_CHAR(TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - 1), 'DD-MON-YYYY')) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COUNT_OF_OFFENDERS, NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_NATIONALITY <> 'British')

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_FN_
field.legacySql: =[FN Pop].[Count of Offenders]In([FN Pop].[Associated Establishment Name])

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_FN_ACCT
field.display: Number of FN currently on ACCT
